table.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: justify; background-color: rgb(238, 240, 252);

td.strong: REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR JOY STA TERESA AND ALLAN DALE.

tr.td:
The first-ever GMA Artist Center Ball was held 8th November 2011 at the Rizal Ballroom of the Makati Shangri-la Hotel. Attended by some of the biggest and the brightest Kapuso talents the occasion was decked in stylish creations by Philippine's top designers.
The star-studded affair also marked the official launch of Profiles magazine. A collaborative effort between GMA Artist Center Head Ida Henares and Philippine Real Estate Festival Media Group President/CEO Rosemarie Basa as the Publisher, with the help of Mega Publishing Group, Profiles magazine is composed of 150 pages and 9 different magazines covers all showcasing the beauty and glamour of GMA stars. Proudly, FusionExcel was there to be part of this momentous event.
Upon the initiative of Presidential Director Joy Sta. Teresa and with the support of FE Founder CEO Mr. Paul Ting, as represented by Crown Presidential Director Pastor Arthur & Marlene Medina, FusionExcel will be promoted through the pages of Profiles magazine in it's initial distribution nationwide. Another exciting move to help FE members advertise their business and to emphasize its support to the "Hope For Children" Charity Program.
Other important people present were GMA Network Chairman and CEO Felipe Gozon, and Mega Publishing President Sari Yap. The Minister and Deputy Chief of Mission – Consul General, Mr Motohiko Kato and Mr Hisoyashi Tanishima, Paraiso Ltd CEO and FE Japan Licensee. The other FE leaders who enjoyed this event were: Crown Presidential Directors Efren King Fortuna, Nathan and Faith Demecillo, Christian and Jasmine Baluran, Executive Directors Pastor and Mrs Louie Pactao, Pastor and Mrs Robert Victoriano, Directors Jinggay Arcilla and Pen Sta Teresa.
Musical performances by GMA's hottest teen stars like Frencheska Farr and Geoff Taylor, girl group La Diva and Julie Anne San Jose. FE Endorser Rhian Ramos was also there as one of the event host. GMA executives, Kapuso stars and members of the Press danced and socialized all night long.
